titleStmt.title: Thomas C. Donn to Ephraim L. Van Winkle
CWG1709

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Washington City Oct 16th 1863
To E. L. Vanwinkle Esr.
Secretary of State for the State of Kentucky
Dear Sir,

Attached hereto I forward you Certificates Signed by our Worthy Mayor and U. S. District attorney as to My capacity and Loyalty. I Can give reference to many other Loyal Men of Standing amongst them the Jon G. D. Hale, Senator from the State of New Hampshire Who is personally Well acquianted with Me in business relations as well as to My Loyalty.
Enclosed I also forward you the fee of 5$ You Will please foward Commission form of oath for file and instructions

I Remain Respectfully
Your obedient Servant
Thomas C. Donn
Commissioner of Deeds
affidavits Depositions & c
to District of Columbia
Various States
